channel.title: Need Help Making Rule for Router!
channel.description:
hey, i need help with my router and making a server please. ive read mod taharoks server guide. ive tryed to make the rule for the router...but i have forgoten pass...so (idk if other people needed a pass for thier router or not) it would be alot easier if people put alot more screenshots for the BIGGER NOOBS lol never done this before i want to learn.i know a bit about coding (read 36 pages of java,ms-dos and jsp coding, dont remember much)
thanks, Oinkie.
P.S, i might have a few more questions to ask over the next few days. :)

item.title: Need Help Making Rule for Router!
item.dc:creator: @bburton31 bburton31
item.description:
@bburton31 wrote:

ok i can’t give you a direct answer to your question as i don’t know!!! but:

This program below gave me everything to set up my server so if you need to make a server i strongly suggest you also download this program… it’s a help file with lots of sources no-ip and himachi… i hope it’s as much hope to you as it was to me. I soon stopped using though once i found my feet and i’m sure you will but some friendly advice newb to newb… get it!

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help Making Rule for Router!
